data.title: 键入缺少的字母，完成下面的文字
data.blankContent: Nick is a teacher. He ____ every ____ before ____ goes ____ work. It ____ him ____ happy ____ the ____. When ____ misses a run, he ____ tired ____ unhappy. Running helps him to be a better teacher, and to feel happier too.
data.partBlankContent: Nick is a teacher. He ru__ every mor____ before h_ goes t_ work. It he__ him fe__ happy f__ the d__. When h_ misses a run, he fe___ tired a__ unhappy. Running helps him to be a better teacher, and to feel happier too.
data.fullContent: Nick is a teacher. He runs every morning before he goes to work. It help him feel happy for the day. When he misses a run, he feels tired and unhappy. Running helps him to be a better teacher, and to feel happier too.
data.answer: 尼克是一名教师。他每天早上上班前都跑步。这能让他一整天都感到快乐。当他错过一次跑步时，他感到疲惫和不快乐。跑步帮助他成为一个更好的老师，也让他感到更快乐。
